nodes.text: The Twisted Forest was the name given to the northern half of the Nightmare Lands on the planet Voss, between the Deepest Woods to the south and the uncorrupted Crysfang Glade to the north beyond the black stone borders of the region. The Vile Grotto was one of several caves located in the area's deep ravines.
The Twisted Forest appears as an area on Voss in the 2011 video game Star Wars: The Old Republic.
